dmca.title: andrewspencerandassociates.com
dmca.body:
nc

  _____  

From: Ashley Wright [mailto:Ashley.Wright@thackraywilliams.com] 
Sent: Monday, June 13, 2005 3:22 AM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: andrewspencerandassociates.com



This site has taken copyrighted material from my company's website and is
using it for fraudulent purposes. 
Please remove their site, or let me know how to get it removed. 

Thank you 




Confidentiality: This email is confidential and may be legally privileged.
If you are not the intended recipient, then you must not copy it, forward
it, disclose it to another person, nor use it for any purpose. Instead,
please return it to the sender immediately. Please then delete your copy
from your system.
Viruses: Although Thackray Williams operates anti-virus programmes, we do
not accept responsibility for viruses or any damage whatsoever that is
caused by viruses being inadvertently passed.
Business Use: Any views or opinions expressed in this message (and any
attachments) that do not relate to the official business of Thackray
Williams are neither given nor endorsed by it.
